RICKS COLLEGE
Rexburg, Idaho
December 13, 1956
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
7o Dr. Harry J. Skornia
Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skornia:
Ricks College is contemplating the establishment of an
FM Educational Broadcasting Station, and I am writing to you
for information concerning membership in the N.A.E.B.
Would we qualify for membership if our broadcasting, to
begin with, is limited to closed circuit broadcasting from our
control room to the dormitory on campus and to limited broadÂ¬
casting over the local commercial station?
Could the N.A.E.B. offer us any technical and engineering
advice concerning our proposed FM station. In addition, we
are planning on obtaining some TV equipment for .limited closed
circuit work. Any similar information that would be helpful
in this endeavor would be appreciated.
Thank you for your assistance.
RCJ:im
